title: Function with Multiple Parameters
description: Create a function 'multiply' that takes two Ints and returns their product.
instructions: Create a function 'multiply' that takes two Ints and returns their product.

commonMistakes.consequence: Returns a + b instead of a * b
Can cause issues with non-commutative operations
commonMistakes.correction: Multiplication is commutative, but keep order consistent

commonMistakes.consequence: Function returns Unit instead of Int
